model_id: Unique identifier for all the PDXs derived from the same tissue sample
validation_technique: Any technique used to validate PDX against their original patient tumour, including fingerprinting, histology, immunohistochemistry - if several technique were used to validate one model, please list all  techniques/descriptions/passage used. Add rows as necessary.
description: Short description of what was compared and what was the result: (e.g. high, good, moderate concordance between xenograft, 'model validated against histological features of same diagnoses' or 'not determined') - It needs to be clear if the model is validated or not.
passages_tested: Provide a list of all passages where validation was performed. Passage 0 correspond to first engraftment (if this is not the case please define how passages are numbered).
validation_host_strain_full: Validation host mouse strain, following mouse strain nomenclature from MGI JAX: https://www.jax.org/jax-mice-and-services/customer-support/technical-support/genetics-and-nomenclature

description: high concordance between xenograft and  patient tumour

passages_tested: list of numbers separted by commas
validation_host_strain_full: full host strain name or not specified
